name: finalLayoutAttributesForDisappearingSupplementaryElement(ofKind:at:)
desc: Returns the ending layout information for a supplementary view being removed from the collection view.
declaration:
func finalLayoutAttributesForDisappearingSupplementaryElement(ofKind elementKind: NSCollectionView.SupplementaryElementKind, 
                                                           at elementIndexPath: IndexPath) -> NSCollectionViewLayoutAttributes?
